DOC.detailed_description: Individuals recruit currently user cannabis alcohol participate study . They undergo physical exam screening . There six study visit subject arrive Clinical Research Unit ( University Iowa Hospitals & Clinics ) night dose . At visit subject receive one follow six dose regimen : placebo alcohol placebo cannabis ; placebo alcohol low-dose cannabis , placebo alcohol higher-dose cannabis , low dose alcohol placebo cannabis ; low dose alcohol low dose cannabis , low dose alcohol higher-dose cannabis . After dose , participant provide saliva sample blood draw periodically check cannabis level complete drive simulation . After complete drive , additional saliva sample blood draw occur participant monitor safe transport home .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult ( age 2155 ) men woman , base medical psychological evaluation Currently valid unrestricted ( except vision correction ) US driver 's license Licensed driver least past two year Drove least 1300 mile past year , selfreport Live within 80 mile radius NADS Available overnight stay follow fullday study session six session Must consider light moderate drinker accord QuantityFrequencyVariability Scale ( QFV ) Cannabis use minimum frequency average least one day per quarter three day week three month prior study entry Peripheral vein suitable repeated venipuncture and/or placement intravenous catheter Systolic blood pressure within clinically normal range ( 120 ± 30 mmHg ) diastolic blood pressure 80 ± 20 mmHg.. Good command write spoken English Female subject reproductive potential must agree use ( and/or partner use ) one ( 1 ) acceptable method birth control begin screen visit throughout study ( include interval treatment periods/panels ) 2 week last dose study drug last treatment period . Acceptable method birth control include follow : intrauterine device ( IUDwith without local hormone release ) , diaphragm , spermicide , cervical cap , contraceptive sponge , oral contraceptive condom . Abstinence alternative lifestyle subject practice abstinence may include study . Presence clinically significant illness , detect history , physical examination , and/or laboratory test , might influence drive performance ( e.g. , seizure , sleep apnea , narcolepsy , vertigo , chronic fatigue syndrome ) put subject increase risk adverse event ( e.g. , cardiac arrhythmia , hypertension ) History clinically significant adverse event associate cannabis alcohol intoxication Donation 450 mL blood within 14 day study drug administration If female , pregnant nursing Currently interested participate drug abuse treatment , participate drug abuse treatment within 60 day precede study enrollment Currently take drug contraindicate use study drug Requires special equipment aid driving ( ex . pedal extension , hand brake throttle , spinner wheel knob nonstandard equipment ) Significant history motion sickness demonstrate significant simulator sickness practice drive screen ( SSQ ) . Subjects must score follow value SSQ : Nausea < 21 , Oculomotor < 32 , Disorientation < 15 , Total Score < 32 . Current alcohol cannabis use disorder , identify Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test alcohol Cannabis Use Disorders Identification Test cannabis .
